sourcesContent: body { margin: 0; padding: 0; overflow: hidden; background: url("your-background-image.jpg") center center / cover fixed; /* Combine background properties into one line */ } .title, .text { font-family: "League Spartan", sans-serif; font-weight: 900; font-style: normal; color: white; margin-top: 9vh; } .text { width: 400px; /* Set width only for text class */ } .text-wrap { padding: 0 10%; /* Combine padding-left with padding */ } .title { font-size: 1.5rem; margin-bottom: 1rem; } .text { font-size: 1rem; padding-bottom: 5%; /* Adjust padding bottom */ } .content-wrapper { height: 100vh; overflow-y: auto; } .container { text-align: center; position: relative; } .image { max-width: 100%; height: auto; cursor: pointer; z-index: 10; } .background { position: absolute; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; background: url("your-background-image.jpg") center center / cover; /* Combine background properties into one line */ transition: background-image 0.5s ease; } .v-enter-active { transition: opacity 0.3s ease; transition-delay: 0.1s; } .v-enter-from { opacity: 0; }
